title: Folio 2F/G
publication_title: James Ensor: The Temptation of Saint Anthony
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body">Ensor added the clouds seen here after the sheets were mounted together on the canvas. Only a few thin lines appear in the area of this folio overlapped by the sheet below (3G), as the right side of the bottom edge reveals. At the center of the folio there are two visible sewing holes. Several pinholes along the top edge and in the lower corners resulted from Ensor’s habit of pinning the sheets together before mounting them on the canvas. SMC/KJN

</section><section id="figures">Folio 2F/G. Interactive image.

fig. 2 </section>
